participant_1.background:
I am a older gentlemen.
I have a passion for god.
I am married.
My favorite book is the bible.

participant_2.background:
I drink a lot of tea.
I hope to one day be a published author.
I write short stories in my free time.
I love art museums.
I work in a used book store.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I work in a used book store.
Oh, that sounds like a fun job. Do you get to read a lot?
Yes, I do. I love reading, and I get to read a lot of different books at work.
That's great. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of genres, but I mostly read historical fiction and fantasy.
I love historical fiction too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon, and I also love the Pillars of the Earth series by Ken Follett.
Those are both great series! I've read them both, and I loved them.
I'm glad to hear that! What about you, what are some of your favorite books?
I love the Harry Potter series by J.K. Rowling, and I also love the Lord of the Rings series by J.R.R. Tolkien.
Those are both great series! I've read them both, and I loved them.
Me too! I'm glad we have similar taste in books.
Me too! I'm always happy to meet someone who loves to read.
Me too! I think it's a great way to learn about new things and explore different worlds.
I agree! I love getting lost in a good book.
Me too! I'm always looking for new books to read. Do you have any suggestions?
Sure, I have a few. I just finished reading The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfuss, and I thought it was really good.
I've heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out.
I also really enjoyed The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo by Stieg Larsson.
I've also heard good things about that book. I'll have to check it out too.
I hope you like them!
